content: Is there a way to say the publisher to use the FHIR 4.b current build instead of the ballot version ?
My understanding is that publishing an IG based on the CI build (in either R5 or R4b) is not supported at all (at least at this time).

Giorgio Cangioli said:

Is there a way to say the publisher to use the FHIR 4.b current build instead of the ballot version ?
